name: edfclasses
brief:
Object-oriented interface for external differentiated functions

Provides C++ class-based wrappers for external functions with user-supplied
derivatives. Inherit from these base classes to integrate external code
(e.g., legacy Fortran, optimized BLAS, specialized solvers) into AD.

**Classes:**
- EDFobject: Basic external function with fixed array sizes
- EDFobject_iArr: External function with integer array parameters
- EDFobject_v2: Version 2 interface with variable-size arrays and context

**Required overrides:**
- function(): Evaluate the external function
- zos_forward(): Zero-order scalar (function evaluation during taping)
- fos_forward(): First-order scalar forward mode
- fov_forward(): First-order vector forward mode
- fos_reverse(): First-order scalar reverse mode
- fov_reverse(): First-order vector reverse mode
see: externfcts.h for C-style external function interface
